overview: Abey Francis, a freelance writer and a professional blogger who enjoys the challenges of creativity and attention to detail. He holds a bachelor’s degree in Instrumentation Engineering and Master of Business Administration degree from Mahatma Gandhi University. He has published many articles and editorials regarding management on different blogs and online journals. His articles stimulate thinking of corporate managers on key issues of organizations and management. His research interests focus on international management, International trade finance, Investment management, leadership, social capital and knowledge management in enterprises and cross-culture studies.
